keyword: calories in chick fil a nuggets 8 count
title: Calories in Chick-fil-A 8 Count Nuggets
meta_description: Learn the calories in Chick-fil-A nuggets 8 count: 250 kcal total, with protein, fat, carbs breakdown, tweaks, and FAQs for fast food nutrition.
assumptions: Standard breaded, fried Chick-fil-A chicken nuggets, 8-count serving, no sauce or sides included.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, recipe changes, and customizations. Based on Chick-fil-A official data; check their app or website for latest info.

quick_answer.text: An 8-count of Chick-fil-A chicken nuggets provides 250 calories and 28 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Choose grilled nuggets instead of breaded
Add one Chick-fil-A sauce packet (140 kcal total)
Dip in honey mustard sauce packet (45 kcal total)

faqs.q: How many calories in Chick-fil-A nuggets 8 count?
How much protein is in 8 Chick-fil-A nuggets?
Are Chick-fil-A 8 count nuggets fried or grilled?
faqs.a: The standard nuggets are breaded and fried; grilled option available separately.

faqs.q: What's the fat content in Chick-fil-A nuggets 8 count?
faqs.a: 11 grams total fat, including 2 grams saturated.

faqs.q: How many carbs in 8 count Chick-fil-A nuggets?
faqs.a: 11 grams of carbohydrates, with 1 gram fiber.
